name: §6§n0 Gravity
description:
§c§lRarity: §r§5§lEpic

§cFloat
§3You float, and can move freely in the air.

§cGravity Switch
§3You can turn on/off gravity for all non-player mobs within 8 blocks. Primary too activate.

§cPower Powder
§3Make power powder by holding blaze powder, and activating your gravity switch

§cPower Crystal
§3Make a power crystal by holding an empty power crystal, and activating your gravity switch.
